message_2:
To find the median of the data set, first, we need to arrange the numbers in ascending order:

{17, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 23, 24, 25, 28, 85}

Since there are 11 numbers in the data set (an odd number), the median is the middle number. In this case, the median is the 6th number:

17, 19, 20, 21, 22, (23), 23, 24, 25, 28, 85

The median of this data set is 23.
